Summary: Cigar/Rod shaped UFO moving rapidly across sky with no sound and HUGE in NJ !
divs: sighting detailslast night(dec.20th)in hillsborough, nj, my husband and i were outside on the porch at approximately 1:25 am, and something caught my eye. it was definitely rod\cigar shaped, moving quickly across the sky. it looked like a thin cloud layer, but it was a definite structure, and completely silent. it appeared to be huge from our observation..with arm's length out straight, it appeared about 2 inches tall from top to bottom. it was headed southwest-ish, and went between jupiter and orien. it was about as high as jupiter was in the sky at the time. i have witnessed ufos before around here, but never seen anything like this!! unfortunately, it went by too fast, and we were not able to get any pictures or footage. i am thankful my husband had also seen it, so i know i wasn't imagining it! we lost sight of it after a few seconds due to some cloud coverage. my husband also claims afterward, he had a ringing sound (like crickets) in his ears. i did not experience that myself. we definitely felt it was not man made..there was no mistaking this for a plane!!
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Hillsborough
There were no other sightings in Hillsborough on or around December 22nd 2011
